title: Login issue
description: User cannot log in with correct credentials.

title: Payment not processing
description: Payment gateway is not responding during checkout.

title: Slow dashboard loading
description: Dashboard takes more than 10 seconds to load.

title: Email not sending
description: Customer reports not receiving confirmation emails.

title: Error 500 on reports page
description: Reports page crashes with internal server error.

title: Mobile app crashing
description: App crashes on Android when opening settings.

title: Password reset not working
description: Reset link is expired immediately after generation.

title: Profile picture upload fails
description: Users cannot upload profile pictures larger than 1MB.

title: Subscription renewal error
description: Auto-renewal is failing for some credit cards.

title: Search bar not responsive
description: Search bar does not resize properly on mobile.
